channel.title: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD)
channel.description: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD) generated by script

item.title: Sumatra floods: Indonesia stuck in a cycle of crisis management
item.description: President Prabowo must address years of institutional neglect to tackle the structural failures fuelling disasters.

item.title: Cyclones to coups: Crises drive violence against women
item.description: Governments treat gendered violence as an afterthought, leaving millions vulnerable across the Indo-Pacific.

item.title: A crisis over using frozen Russian assets to help Ukraine
item.description: It’s an old-style Euro punch-up in a deadly new context

item.title: Head in sand, the way of the ASEAN ostrich
item.description: Malaysia’s chairmanship sidestepped divisive issues. Manila’s turn will force ASEAN to confront its paralysis.

item.title: A World of Cons, Crooks, and Culprits
item.description: Where scam industries are thriving around the globe.

item.title: A giant iron-ore mine could bring Guinea riches or ruin
item.description: It all depends on how the country’s junta uses the windfall

item.title: As Ukraine Fights Corruption, Trump Does the Opposite
item.description: Ukrainians want honest government, even as American and Russian kleptocrats circle their country.

item.title: Japan’s Grim Demographic Reality
item.description: Can an anti-immigration turn really be compatible with a ‘Japan is Back’ narrative?
